General.Name: Ensari Deri Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Ensari Deri Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. processes and produces various kinds of raw and semi-finished leather in Turkey. It offers merino, merinillo, lacoon, Toscana, rassado, tigrado, French, and domestic UK products. The company also exports its products to Asia, Europe, South Korea, Italy, India, Poland, Germany, Hong Kong, Austria, Denmark, Greece, England, Belgium, Morocco, the United States, Canada, Spain, the United Arab Emirates, Esthonia, Portugal, Russia, Pakistan, Republic of China, and Lithuania. Ensari Deri Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Zübeyde Hanÿm Caddesi No:122, Istanbul, Turkey
